item.title: Marburg Virus Confirmed In Tanzania After Series Of Deaths
item.description: Officials previously questioned whether the deadly disease was indeed present in the African country, which had seen 8 suspected Marburg deaths.

item.title: Experts Predict The Bubble May Burst For AI In 2025
item.description: It’s not the first time experts have urged caution as companies jostle to carve their AI empires. But this time, it's a cocktail of good and bad.
